changeSet.sql: WITH product_data AS ( SELECT gen_random_uuid() AS id, 'Product_' || gs AS name, '100000' || ROW_NUMBER() OVER ()::TEXT AS article, 'Description for Product_' || gs AS description, (SELECT id FROM categories ORDER BY random() LIMIT 1) AS category_id, 10 AS price, FLOOR(RANDOM() * 1000 + 1)::BIGINT AS quantity, now() AS last_quantity_update, now() AS created_at FROM generate_series(1, 1000000) AS gs ) INSERT INTO products (id, name, article, description, category_id, price, quantity, last_quantity_update, created_at) SELECT * FROM product_data;
